entry.title: Hexo+github_pages网站搭建
entry.content: 搭建过程网上已经很多。参考如下。http://www.jeyzhang.com/hexo-github-blog-building.htmlhttps://help.github.com/articles/connecting-to-github-with-ssh/http://huzhifeng.github.io/2014/10/04/hexo-guide/ Hexo使用Create a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
